headline: TRUMP DROPS THE EPSTEIN BOMB 💣📂‼️ DOJ ORDERED TO SPILL ALL THE DIRTY DEETS IN 30 DAYS ⏰🔥 DEMS SWEATING BULLETS 😰💦
text:
UH-OH⁉️💥 DONALD J TRUMP 👑🇺🇸 just FLEXED 🎩✍️ and SIGNED the BILL 📜🚀 ordering DOJ to DUMP ALL EPSTEIN FILES 🕵️‍♂️📂 in SEARCHABLE DOWNLOADABLE FORMAT 📥🔍 within 30 DAYS ⏳😈! From CRIMINAL PROBES 🕵️‍♀️🚔 including VICTIM INTERVIEWS 💔🗣️, RAID SEIZURES 🏠💼, FLIGHT LOGS ✈️📝, and SHADY CONNECTIONS 👥🌐 – internal DOJ CHATTER 💬📱 all OUTTA THE VAULT 🏦🚪! Trump flipped the SCRIPT 🔄 after EPSTEIN VICTIMS 👩‍🍼😢 and his own GOP SIMPS 🤠🐂 PUSHED BACK – bill CRUSHED HOUSE 427-1 🏛️💥 and SENATE UNANIMOUS 🤝📈 TUESDAY! 'TRUTH ABOUT DEMOCRATS & EPSTEIN ASSOCIATIONS DROPPING SOON CUZ I SIGNED IT BAYBEE' Trump tweeted 🔥📱🐦!

NO PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NEEDED 👑📜 but CONGRESS WENT FULL THROTTLE 🏎️💨 – these ain't the 20K+ ESTATE PAGES from LAST WEEK 📄📦 that ROASTED TRUMP 😈 with Epstein's 2018 TEXTOIDS: 'I CAN TAKE HIM DOWN' & 'I KNOW HOW DIRTY DONALD IS' 🧼😏! Trump like 'WE WERE BROS ONCE 🤝🍾 but SPLIT EARLY 2000s BEFORE ARREST 🚫⏰ – NO WRONGDOING HERE FOLKS 🙅‍♂️✅!' To REPORTERS 📸🗳️: 'REPS CLEAN 🧼 GOP GOT NOTHIN' – IT'S A DEM PROBLEM, THEY WERE HIS HOMIES ALL OF 'EM 😤🔵!'

VIRGINIA GIUFFRE FAMILY 💔👨‍👩‍👦 (RIP queen 😢💐) CALLS IT MONUMENTAL 🗽🏆: 'NEXT CHAPTER VIGILANT 👀⚔️ – EVERY NAME OUT NO MATTER POWER 💰👑, WEALTH 🤑, PARTY 🎉!' Epstein 'SUICIDED' 🪦🔒 in 2019 NYC CELL (CORONER SAID SO 🤷‍♂️) on SEX TRAFFICKING CHARGES 🚨🍑 after 2008 MINOR PROZZY CONVICT 🧒🚔. High-flyer FINANCIER 🤑✈️ linked to PRINCE ANDREW 🥜👑 (King Charles bro 😬), TRUMP 👨‍💼, STEVE BANNON 🐸🕶️, media/politics/entertainment CLOWNS 🤡🎥!

WEDNESDAY SHAKEUP: HARVARD EX-PREZ LARRY SUMMERS 📚😎 on LEAVE 🚪⏰ cuz CHUMMY EPSTEIN EMAILS 🥂📧 DROPPED – investigation GO TIME 🕵️‍♂️🔍! AG PAM BONDI 💅🔥 MUST RELEASE ALL UNCLASSIFIED on EPSTEIN + GHISLAINE MAXWELL 🧙‍♀️🚔 (20YR SENTENCE 🍑🔒) in 30 DAYS – but can HOLD BACK PRIVACY INVASIONS 🙈 or ACTIVE PROBES 🚨! Rep THOMAS MASSIE 🗳️😟 WORRIED: 'TRUMP OPENING INVESTIGATION FLOOD 🚪🌊 to BLOCK FILES? SUS 👀!'

DEMS PANICKING 😱💨 as FLIGHT LOGS ✈️🕵️‍♂️ might EXPOSE WHO WAS LOLITA EXPRESS RIDING 🛩️🍆 – PRINCE PIZZA PARTY INVITES? 🥧👑 BANNON BREWING TEA? ☕🐸 ZUCK? PICH? Wait no, EPSTEIN'S LITE – but TRUMP SAID HOLD MY BIGLY PEN ✍️🍆 and RELEASED THE KRAKEN 🦑📂! VICTIMS SLAYING FOR JUSTICE ⚖️💪, MAXWELL ROTTING 🍑🚫, and WHOLE ELITE CIRCLE JERK 👥💦 ABOUT TO GET EXPOSED 🤯🔥 – BUCKLE UP BUTTERCUP 🚀😈 it's GONNA BE WILD RIDE 🎢💣!
